text:
The retrospective columns concern historical data. The base year is the historical reference date
or period for which information is available and against which subsequent information can be
compared over time, as stated in ESRS 1 Chapter 6.3 Reporting progress against the base year.
Compilation of Explanations January—November 2024 Page 135 of 278
